content: This is the color of the crimson-colored hills at dusk in the highlands. I hope it'll decorate your planet from the branches of the Luca Arbor.
info: NPC成长等级-6级演出-1011多杰朗_多杰朗

content: {A看我的}<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, buddy, hat's up! Let's bump heads. I'm feeling strong like never before... I want you to have this <style=Highlight>Luca Fruit: Crimsoncloud Cliffs</style>.
